channel.title: Comments on: What a Difference a Day Makes! – Monday, April 9, 2018

item.title: By: Bonnie
item.dc:creator: Bonnie
item.description: I had no idea. My mom had just talked to your mom last week. My prayers for quick recovery for your mom. Hang in there guys.
item.content:encoded: I had no idea. My mom had just talked to your mom last week. My prayers for quick recovery for your mom. Hang in there guys.
